channel.title: Remote Help Service!
channel.description:
Hi And welcome to my remote Help service this is ware u tell me if you have a problem Codeing And i will remotely controll your computer and fix/help/teach you how to code! im decent at this and here is what i ask of you!
1.If at any time you want me to stop Controlling your computer Just start moveing the mouse and i will STOP immediately! 2.When finished i will remove you computer from remote control list and i will have you verify that it is removed, 3.I will NOt do anything you dont want me to do im here to do what you want me to do and that is all. 4.Do not steal my account as it is free so i dont see why you would. 5.do not say stuff i didnt do so dont be like "OMFG He hacked my passwords!" because i dont have any reason to and i dont know how.
so if you would like my help Just add me to MSN at halo_1_and_2_king@hotmail.com or aim at garaa447 for more info.
For info on how i will be doing this go to
[url=http://www.logmein.com]logmein.com[/url]
Im just simply trying to be helpfull and want to gain being more trusted :)

item.title: Remote Help Service!
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

by “codeing” i mean Java or helping with your moparscape server, I can do other things Like if somethings wrong i can fix BUT I WOULD NEVER! And i mean NEver Harm someones Computer, Im Just Trying to be helpful, if you think this is wrong then just have a mod say something and i will remove it at ONCE!
and again if you read it it says just start moveing the mouce randomly and i will stop and remove! and have you varify that it was removed,

if you feel that “codeing” makes it suspicus that i will change it all i mean is help with server codeing,
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2007, 07:37:43 AM[/size][hr]*note this is safe and if you feel that i shouldnt be doing this then say so and ill remove this topic

Read full topic

item.title: Remote Help Service!

item.description:

Hmmm, i woudlnt want somone who refers to rs2 private server programming as “codeing” with acsess to my computer.
